title: WiFi/BT Stability QA Engineer
summary: Are you a fearless thinker? Do you love the challenge of advancing a widely accepted technology? In the Wireless Software group, you’ll be responsible for bringing groundbreaking wireless connectivity to the world through Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and more. You’ll design, develop, and patent the next generation of our state-of-the-art connectivity technologies. You’ll collaborate across departments to help craft wireless solutions that elevate the customer experience with Apple products and services. Our goal is to ensure nothing stands in the way of our customers’ connections with their devices. If you join us, you’ll help build world-renowned wireless systems so seamless that they almost feel like magic. Join our Wireless Software Engineering team and drive innovation that matters! We create and seamlessly integrate technologies that enrich people’s lives and deliver the best user experience. The Wireless Technologies team is looking for a highly qualified software engineer to help ensure quality and stability for WiFi/BT Technologies for all iOS, macOS, tvOS and watchOS platforms. If you are passionate about quality, possess excellent problem-solving and communication skills, we may have the job for you.
description: As a Wireless Stability Engineer, you will join a dynamic team responsible for the stability of WiFi, Bluetooth and Thread software on Apple products. The successful candidate will be involved in stress and stability testing for WiFi/BT technologies and its features for iPhones/iPads, Apple Watches, Apple TV’s, and Mac product lines.
preferred_qualifications:
Thrive in a collaborative environment and comfortable working with cross-functional teams
Laser-focused on the smallest details that are meaningful to our customers
Passionate about learning
